name: museo-vallenato-monorepo
description: Monorepo para app Expo, panel admin (API + web) y servidores auxiliares del Museo del Vallenato.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n ADMIN-API,ADMIN-WEB,APP,MEDIA -c green,cyan,magenta,yellow "npm --prefix admin-panel run dev:server" "npm --prefix admin-panel run web" "npm --prefix app-museo-vallenato run start" "cross-env PORT=5174 node tools/serveMedia.mjs"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently -n ADMIN-API,ADMIN-WEB -c green,cyan "npm --prefix admin-panel run dev:server" "npm --prefix admin-panel run web"
